duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage personal injury litigation process including review of medical reports, discovery, scheduling, and pleading/motions drafting.
Drafting motions, answering discovery, and overseeing case deadlines.
Assisting with trials, depositions, and court filings.
Communicate with clients, courts, opposing counsel, experts, and mediators.
Accurately document data in Needles (case management database) and work in a group environment.
Assist partners, associates, and other legal assistants across practice areas and different departments.

education_certification.credential: Paralegal Certification or Associate's Degree in Paralegal Studies (Bachelor's preferred)
